pergunta: Ctenophora é um gênero de sponges
resposta: Ctenophora is a genus of sponges

pergunta: Ctenophora e Ctenophaga são gêneros diferentes
resposta: Ctenophora and Ctenophaga are different genera

pergunta: Ctenophora vive principalmente na superfície marine
resposta: Ctenophora primarily lives on the marine surface

resposta: Ctenophora can have a lifespan between 100 to 200 years

resposta: Ctenophora is found in tropical and subtropical oceans

pergunta: Ctenophora é maior que Ctenophaga em termos de tamanho
resposta: Ctenophora is larger than Ctenophaga in terms of size

resposta: The Ctenophora is a sponge that lives in large groups

resposta: Ctenophora is a species of sponges with various types of feeding
